trial_identification.studytitle: vaginal and abdominal surgery for female stress incontinence
trial_identification.scientifictitle: abdominal burch colposuspension versus transobturator tape vaginal surgery in female genuine stress incontinence

conditioncode.conditioncode2: Other reproductive health and childbirth disorders

interventions.interventions: arm 1: vaginal transobturator tape insertion using prolene tape at the level of midurethera by gynecologist with 5 years of experience .this will be done in shatby maternity university hospital,alexandria ,egypt. by gynecolist with 5 years of experience. .the approximate duration of the procedure is 10-15 minutes
interventions.comparator: arm 2: abdominal burch colposuspension through laparotomy with suturing of the paravesical and parauretheral fascia at the bladder neck and midurethera to the cooper`s ligament bilaterally that will be performed by gynecologist with 5 years of experience .this will be done in shatby maternity university hospital,alexandria ,egypt..the approximate duration of the procedure is 45 minutes.

primaryOutcome.outcome: failure rate by recurrence of symptoms from medical records
primaryOutcome.timepoint: baseline, one month ,6 month after surgery

secondaryOutcome.outcome: complications as bleeding , hematoma with blood transfusion, bladder tear from medical records.
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: during surgery and one week after surgery

secondaryOutcome.outcome: duration of surgery from medical records

trial_design.concealment: Participants who cannot afford the intervention treatment will be allocated to arm 2 (abdominal burch colposuspension), and participants who can afford the intervention will be allocated to arm 1 (vaginal transobturator tape insertion)

sponsorship.primarysponsoraddress: portsaied street shatby maternity university hospital besided bibliotheca alexandrina alexandria ,egypt 20255

fundingsource.fundingaddress: portsaied street shatby maternity university hospital besided bibliotheca alexandrina alexandria ,egypt 20255

ethicsAndSummary.summary: This is a prospective study where a Burch colposuspension through laparotomy versus vaginal transobturator tape surgery were studied for efficacy,duration and complications .

ethicscommitee.ethicaddress: portsaied street shatby maternity university hospital besided bibliotheca alexandrina alexandria ,egypt 20255
